title: Billy Porter, Annaleigh Ashford | Left Behind
description:
Cable news is freaking out about what this year's elections mean for the future of the Democratic party, so Congressional Democrats vow to plow full steam ahead on finally getting Biden's Build Back Better plan passed. Meanwhile, the world's largest potato breaks ground, and the world's best cheese leaves one judge head over heels. Up next, Fashion icon, Emmy, Tony, & Grammy winning performer Billy Porter talks zebra print shoes and his new memoir, "Unprotected." Then, Tony winner Annaleigh Ashford is feeling great to be back on Broadway in the Ed Sullivan Theater to promote her CBS show, "B Positive."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
